header.tagline: Release your music as an NFT.

royalties.title: Royalties
royalties.description: Here you can set the royalty percentage you receive as an artist on every secondary sale

stakeholders.title: Stakeholders
stakeholders.description: Add stakeholders to your release. You can allocate 100 shares between multiple stakeholders. Each share equates to 1% of every primary sale of your release.
